# Government of Canada Tender Announcement
### Tender Details
#### Title
Automotive Glass Installation, Parts and Repair

#### Reference Number
WS3863006925-Doc3872268087

#### Amendment Number
2

#### Solicitation Number
WS3863006925

#### Tendering Authority
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

 #### Contracting Authority Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence requires a Standing Offer for Automotive Glass Repairs. The scope of work includes the provision of services to the mobile support fleet holdings at CFB Suffield. The Standing Offer period is from July 1, 2023, to June 30, 2024, with two (2) additional one (1) year option periods.

#### Tender Documents
The Solicitation Documents are available on the Ariba Discovery website: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15418372?extsite=MTU0MTgzNzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Contact Information
Ruwani Wall (SPAC/PSPC)
ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tender Closing Date
March 8, 2023, at 2:00PM EST

#### Important Notes
All bids must be submitted by the tender closing date to be considered responsive. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.
Order of Precedence
 Goods and Services Subject to a Trade Agreement
To the extent possible, it is the intention of the Government of Canada to award contracts to bidders who are Canadian-controlled and owned, and that propose goods or services subject to an international trade agreement between Canada and the United States.

#### Trade Agreements
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Region of Performance
The work will be performed at CFB Suffield, Alberta.

**This document represents the Government of Canada's tender announcement and all the details above.**
